entry.source: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F813,1,401101}Oh, I thought you'd be out looking for{F801}Yuriko. You're sure you want to be{F801}wasting time here?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F813,1,401101}Oh, I thought you'd be out looking for{F801}Yuriko. You're sure you want to be{F801}wasting time here?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F87A,116}{F813,1,403023}Ow! Wait... my arm! Stop that, I say...!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F87A,116}{F813,1,403023}Ow! Wait... my arm! Stop that, I say...!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F813,1,401102}...Both me and your friend here are{F801}looking forward to hearing good news.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F813,1,401102}...Both me and your friend here are{F801}looking forward to hearing good news.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F813,1,415105}{F813,1,401102}Hm? Didn't I warn you enough yet? Why{F801}aren't you out looking for Yuriko...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F813,1,415105}{F813,1,401102}Hm? Didn't I warn you enough yet? Why{F801}aren't you out looking for Yuriko...?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F87A,116}{F813,1,403023}Ouch! What are you... my neck!{F801}Stop that, I say...!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F87A,116}{F813,1,403023}Ouch! What are you... my neck!{F801}Stop that, I say...!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F813,1,401102}I'm not a patient man. You should bring{F801}me results soon, don't you think?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Tayama\0{F87A,17}{F813,1,401102}I'm not a patient man. You should bring{F801}me results soon, don't you think?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F87A,116}Oh... You came again! How considerate{F801}of your master Samurai you are!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F87A,116}Oh... You came again! How considerate{F801}of your master Samurai you are!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F87A,116}But you have your own duty to fulfill,{F801}no? I shall endure here. Now, go...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Master Samurai\0{F87A,116}But you have your own duty to fulfill,{F801}no? I shall endure here. Now, go...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0{F87A,29}{F813,1,404301}...Alright, stop right there.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0{F87A,29}{F813,1,404301}...Alright, stop right there.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ashura-kai man\0{F87A,137}That bitch didn't send you, did she?{F801}Then you really got no business here.{F801}{F802}Just turn on around and go home...{F801}Forget what happened here.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ashura-kai man\0{F87A,137}That bitch didn't send you, did she?{F801}Then you really got no business here.{F801}{F802}Just turn on around and go home...{F801}Forget what happened here.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Scary-faced man\0{F87A,138}{F813,1,68001}Who're you? Ya came to join the{F801}Ashura-kai?{F801}{F802}...Didn't ya read the conditions? Bring{F801}us a recommendation from a member or{F801}three fresh kids.{F801}{F802}No exceptions. Now turn around and{F801}go on home.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Scary-faced man\0{F87A,138}{F813,1,68001}Who're you? Ya came to join the{F801}Ashura-kai?{F801}{F802}...Didn't ya read the conditions? Bring{F801}us a recommendation from a member or{F801}three fresh kids.{F801}{F802}No exceptions. Now turn around and{F801}go on home.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ashura-kai man\0{F87A,46}{F813,1,404311}Mr. Tayama told me to not let anyone{F801}near Shibuya.{F801}{F802}...So there ya have it. Scram.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ashura-kai man\0{F87A,46}{F813,1,404311}Mr. Tayama told me to not let anyone{F801}near Shibuya.{F801}{F802}...So there ya have it. Scram.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ashura-kai man\0{F87A,46}{F813,1,404321}Mr. Tayama said you Samurai can pass.{F801}{F802}...So there ya have it. Have fun.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ashura-kai man\0{F87A,46}{F813,1,404321}Mr. Tayama said you Samurai can pass.{F801}{F802}...So there ya have it. Have fun.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ashura-kai man\0{F87A,46}{F813,1,404311}This way leads all sorts of places:{F801}Toyosu, Tennozu... other stuff...{F801}{F802}But Mr. Tayama said not to let anyone{F801}pass.{F801}{F802}So long as our Ashura-kai's still{F801}around, just assume you're not getting{F801}through here.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ashura-kai man\0{F87A,46}{F813,1,404311}This way leads all sorts of places:{F801}Toyosu, Tennozu... other stuff...{F801}{F802}But Mr. Tayama said not to let anyone{F801}pass.{F801}{F802}So long as our Ashura-kai's still{F801}around, just assume you're not getting{F801}through here.{F801}

I'll let you cross the river.{F801}And the Ashura-kai doesn't have to{F801}know...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79024}Or at least that was the plan...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79025}But there aren't any open boats right{F801}now, what with the big group of{F801}customers going to Ikebukuro.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,79026}Sorry about that. You'll have to go{F801}kill some time somewhere.{F801}
